security_audit.summary: The asset-creator skill is a legitimate image generation tool using OpenAI's DALL-E API. While it accesses environment variables for API keys and performs filesystem operations, these are necessary for its intended functionality. The code shows proper input validation and secure coding practices.

content.user_title: Generate custom images with AI-powered DALL-E integration
content.value_statement: Stop searching for stock photos. Create unique, on-brand visuals instantly with AI image generation. This skill integrates DALL-E 3 to produce high-quality assets tailored to your exact specifications.
actual_capabilities: Create assets in minimalist, flat design style
Save images to organized public directory structure
Support for vivid and natural image styles
Automatic directory creation for asset organization
limitations: Requires valid OpenAI API key with DALL-E access

use_cases.title: Create hero section illustrations
use_cases.description: Generate custom hero images for landing pages that perfectly match your brand style and messaging.

use_cases.title: Design social media graphics
use_cases.description: Produce unique visuals for blog posts, social campaigns, and marketing materials without stock photo limitations.

use_cases.title: Generate UI mockup assets
use_cases.description: Create placeholder images and illustrations for prototypes, wireframes, and design presentations.

prompt_templates.title: Basic image generation
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an image of a modern dashboard interface with charts and graphs, minimalist flat design, white background

prompt_templates.title: Marketing hero image
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a hero image showing people collaborating on laptops, bright and vibrant, corporate memphis style, tech blue colors

prompt_templates.title: Icon-style illustration
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a set of 4 minimalist icons representing security, speed, analytics, and collaboration, flat vector style

prompt_templates.title: Complex scene generation
prompt_templates.prompt: Design an isometric illustration of a modern office space with diverse team members, natural lighting, clean aesthetic

output_examples.input: Modern coffee shop interior with people working on laptops
output: Generated a 1024x1024 HD image saved to public/assets/images/coffee-shop-workspace.png
Image features minimalist flat design with natural lighting
White background makes it easy to integrate into web designs
Ready to use with: <Image src='/assets/images/coffee-shop-workspace.png' alt='Modern coffee shop workspace' />

output_examples.input: Tech conference banner with abstract network connections
output: Features abstract network nodes and connections in tech blue palette
High-resolution output suitable for both web and print use
Natural style selected for more realistic rendering

best_practices: Always specify 'white background' for easy integration into web designs
Include style keywords like 'minimalist', 'flat design', 'vector style' for consistent results
Use the folder parameter to organize assets by project or category
anti_patterns: Avoid requesting transparent backgrounds - DALL-E outputs JPG/PNG with solid backgrounds
Don't generate multiple images in one prompt - create separate requests for each asset
Never use vague prompts without style specifications - results will be inconsistent

faq.question: What image formats does it support?
faq.answer: DALL-E 3 generates JPG images, saved as PNG files. True transparency is not available.

faq.question: Can I generate multiple images at once?
faq.answer: Currently supports single image generation per request. Run multiple commands for multiple assets.

faq.question: What resolution are the images?
faq.answer: All images are generated at 1024x1024 pixels in HD quality.

faq.question: Do I need a special OpenAI account?
faq.answer: Yes, you need an OpenAI API key with DALL-E access. Pay-per-use pricing applies.

faq.question: Can I use these images commercially?
faq.answer: OpenAI grants full usage rights for generated images, including commercial use.

faq.question: How do I style the images consistently?
faq.answer: Use the provided style keywords and choose 'vivid' or 'natural' style parameter for consistency.
